extendedInfo.description: _NOT_ for US Galaxy S without secondary camera!!! (Vibrant, Fascinate, Captivate, etc.).For Epic use 'Mirror for Epic 4G'.Forgot your mirror? Want to check your hair or make-up? Use your phone! This app uses the secondary camera to show you your mirror image.Tip: change color and zoom from menu, get PRO for snapshot.

reviews.title: Sideways
reviews.comment: The image is rotated 90\302\260. Rotating the phone, with or without the screen rotation enabled, does not work to correct this (no orientation detection).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idiot below me.
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t supposed to be reflective, it clearly states that it uses the front facing camera, arrgh! I downloaded this just to write that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works on sgs2 \"but dnt see the point in it as i can use my forward facing camera by going on my own camera options!\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work on samsung galaxy s. just gives a black screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Charlene
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work just blacks out the screen and freezes my phone. I would use it as a mirror any way if it didn\'t freeze my phone. Uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mirror
reviews.comment: Not bad its better then the evo mirror
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalling!
reviews.comment: I have the GalaxyS 4G with front and rear facing cameras. It is completely off! It switches from front to rear like if it\'s having a ciezure! It\'s also flipped. For example, if you have your hair to the left, it\'ll show u with ur hair to the right! It\'s also sideways! This application was a complete miss fire! An epic fail! Do not waste your time with this crap! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Obvious!!--
reviews.comment: Its just a black screen to see your reflection. Just like when you turn your screen off you can see yourself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dose not work. Just a black screen droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks is an understatement!
reviews.comment: One small problem that ruins the whole concept of this app is that the image is flipped on its side. Did anyone test this before releasing this app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mirror
reviews.comment: It crashed my android phone so I had to uninstall it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kyla 24/7
reviews.comment: What the hell I hate this it I\'d just a black screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is gr8
reviews.comment: This a good app i recomend u to download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: Works fine on my galaxy s except whn looking at it im always horizontal no matter which way i turn the phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get it!
reviews.comment: No good! Image is always horizontal no matter which way you turn it. Uninstalled. Galaxy S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work for Asus transformer
reviews.comment: yes I know this is designed for Samsung galaxy S, but I just want to save some other people\'s time. as I write this review, this mirror does not work for the Asus Eee Pad Transformer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice to be able to use my phone as a mirror
reviews.comment: Works on my htc amaze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same as \"front view\" camera
reviews.comment: Works ok on my Samsung Galaxy, but I just realized I don\'t need it as I have \"front view\" camera on my phone which works better than a mirror.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Friend recommended
reviews.comment: Makes the front camera work so much better works well in australia
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would give it no stats if it let me. This app is a piece of crap
reviews.author: A Google User
